results.description:
For our October '17 meetup we welcome Stuart Herbert (@stuherbert)

In this talk, Stuart will look at why he uses virtualisation for his dev environments, and why he’s switched from traditional virtual machines to Docker containers for this. He’ll show you how he builds and publishes Docker images for PHP applications, how he uses them, and share with you his tips for getting the most out of Docker.
results.name: PHP Dev Environments Using Docker
